messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I came out here because I wanted to
see the Pokémon League for myself.
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
I’m shocked...
No, really, I am.
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
The way I battle now, well, I can
only look at the Pokémon League!You, go on! You go to the Pokémon
League for me, too!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I’ve been training here in hopes of
going to the Pokémon League.
